dict.acceptation: 不幸地，遗憾地；可惜；不巧；

sent.orig: Unfortunately, it can not be said, unfortunately, all-gong fishing, those who are willing to hook only.
sent.trans: 不幸的是，也不能说是不幸，毕竟是“姜太公钓鱼，愿者上钩”而已。

sent.orig: Unfortunately, it has a special orbit which overlaps with Neptune's.
sent.trans: 然而不幸的是，冥王星的轨道很特殊，与海王星是相交的。

sent.orig: Generally, the food was excellent there, but unfortunately this added a lot to our weight!
sent.trans: 总的来说，这里的美食的确很棒，可是在享受美食的同时，我们的体重也增加了不少！

sent.orig: Unfortunately, the fleas on those rats carried a disease called Bubonic Plague.
sent.trans: 不幸的是，那些老鼠身上的跳蚤携带着一种被称为“黑死病”的疾病。

sent.orig: Unfortunately I don't have the say.
sent.trans: 遗憾的是我没有决定权。
